name: Ergonomic Office Chair
details: Ergonomic chair with adjustable height and lumbar support, perfect for long working hours.

name: Wooden Dining Chair
details: Classic wooden dining chair with a cushioned seat for a comfortable dining experience.

name: Recliner Chair
details: Luxurious recliner chair with plush cushions and adjustable reclining positions.

name: Plastic Armchair
details: Durable plastic armchair, lightweight and perfect for both indoor and outdoor use.

name: Leather Executive Chair
details: Premium leather executive chair with high backrest and ergonomic design.

name: Rocking Chair
details: Classic wooden rocking chair with a smooth rocking motion, perfect for relaxation.

name: Accent Chair
details: Stylish accent chair with a cushioned seat and backrest, perfect for living rooms.

name: Bar Stool
details: Modern bar stool with a high seat and footrest, perfect for kitchen counters and bars.

name: Folding Chair
details: Space-saving foldable chair made from sturdy materials, easy to store and transport.

name: Bean Bag Chair
details: Comfortable and cozy bean bag chair with soft filling, perfect for lounging.
